task.title: Viewing the system model
task.shortdesc: You can view an existing system model or you can create a system model if a system model does not exist on the System Model page.

taskbody.prereq: You must be a licensed user.

info.p: The System Model page is displayed.

step.cmd: Perform any of the following actions:

ul.li: Add a Team Space repository, if no repository is configured as the Team Space repository.
Create a system model, if no model is created or exists.
View the system model that exists.

taskbody.result: You have viewed an existing system model from the System Model page.
taskbody.postreq:
From the System Model page, you can perform any of the following tasks:
Add a Team Space repository, if no repository is configured as the Team Space repository. See .
Create a system model, if no model is created or exists. See .
Modify the existing system model. See .
